slides.title: Let us keep Your moments of life safely in calm.
slides.description:
Welcome to PhotoState - free photo hosting.
We have a room for every frame, every emotion, captured smile. We will help you to save thousands of the best moments of your life and will make sure that you always have an access to your priceless collections.

Only few spent minutes for registration allow to use our service absolutely free and without any restrictions.

slides.title: Share Your captures with Your Dears...
slides.description:
We follow the policy of complete confidentiality and privacy.
Although your photos are protected from accessing by anyone else apart of you we provide the easy way to share the certain albums for the particular persons.
Everything is upt to you.

slides.title: Don't let your memories to be lost.
